challenge_locked.name: Locked
text: Win a run with at least

bb_4: if you beat it, then the

Pair: 2 cards that share the same rank. They may
be played with up to 3 other unscored cards
Flush Five: 5 cards with the same rank and suit
Three of a Kind: 3 cards with the same rank. They may be
played with up to 2 other unscored cards
Straight Flush: 5 cards in a row (consecutive ranks) with
all cards sharing the same suit
Two Pair: 2 pairs of cards with different ranks, may
be played with 1 other unscored card
Royal Flush: 5 cards in a row (consecutive ranks) with
all cards sharing the same suit
Four of a Kind: 4 cards with the same rank. They may
be played with 1 other unscored card
Flush House: A Three of a Kind and a Pair with
all cards sharing the same suit
Flush: 5 cards that share the same suit
High Card: If the played hand is not any of the above
hands, only the highest ranked card scores
Full House: A Three of a Kind and a Pair

v_dictionary.deck_preview_wheel_plural: Numbers may be lower due to the #1# cards drawn face down
v_dictionary.deck_preview_wheel_singular: Numbers may be lower due to the #1# card drawn face down

ml_controller_required: A game controller is required to play.
Please connect a controller to continue.
ml_crash_report_info: Crash reports will be sent to the developer
to help reduce issues in the future. No
identifying or personal info will be sent.

ch_c_minus_hand_size_per_X_dollar: Hold {C:red}-1{} cards in hand for every {C:money}$#1#{} you have

achievement_descriptions.completionist_plus_plus: Earn a Gold Sticker on every Joker
achievement_descriptions.you_get_what_you_get: Win a run without rerolling the shop
achievement_descriptions.flushed: Play a Flush with 5 Wild Cards
achievement_descriptions._100000k: Score 100,000,000 Chips in a single hand
achievement_descriptions.high_stakes: Win a run on at least Gold Stake difficulty
achievement_descriptions._1000k: Score 1,000,000 Chips in a single hand
achievement_descriptions._10k: Score 10,000 Chips in a single hand
achievement_descriptions.low_stakes: Win a run on at least Red Stake difficulty
achievement_descriptions.tiny_hands: Thin your deck down to 20 or fewer cards
achievement_descriptions.speedrunner: Win a run in 12 or fewer rounds
achievement_descriptions.shattered: Break 2 Glass Cards in a single hand
achievement_descriptions.big_hands: Have 80 or more cards in your deck
achievement_descriptions.retrograde: Get any poker hand to level 10
achievement_descriptions.nest_egg: Have $400 or more during a single run
achievement_descriptions.completionist_plus: Win with every deck on Gold Stake difficulty
achievement_descriptions.mid_stakes: Win a run on at least Black Stake difficulty
